title: Two-Meat Meatloaf
ingredients: ['Meatloaf', '250g minced beef', '250g pork sausagemeat', '4 slices bread, crumbled', '1 egg', '1/2 teaspoon curry powder', '1 onion, chopped', '2 tablespoons tomato ketchup', 'Glaze', '1 tablespoon water', '1 1/2 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '2 dessertspoons dark brown soft sugar', '2 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '1/2 teaspoon vinegar']
